summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2494, for the improvement of East 45th Street from 15th Avenue Northeast to 20th Avenue Northeast; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and subgrading and paving the same with asphalt or some other suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation; by the construction of concrete curbs with armored concrete or granite corners, by doing all necessary grading and the construction of concrete walks where necessary, including as part of said work the construction or reconstruction of all sewers, side sewers and watermains, with their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage, drainage, water service and fire protection of said district; under Ordinance No. 27339 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
